alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:21PM EDT until March 31 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NEWTON...SOUTHEASTERN PORTER AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 921 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near La Crosse to near Wheatfield to near Morocco, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Wheatfield around 925 PM CDT. Rensselaer around 935 PM CDT. Hanging Grove around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Fair Oaks, Parr, Dunns Bridge, Baileys Corner, Mount Ayr, Stoutsburg and Collegeville. This includes...US 41 Dragway. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 213 and 227. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
